data.price: et offrent la nourriture, malgré son amour [1013], au pauvre, à l’orphelin et au prisonnier,
data.arabic: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
data.footnotes: [1013] Malgré son amour: l’amour de la nourriture et le fait d’en avoir besoin, ou encore pour l’amour d’Allah.

meta.transliteration: wayuṭ'ʿimūna al-ṭaʿāma ʿalā ḥubbihi mis'kīnan wayatīman wa-asīran

data.price: (disant) : "C’est pour le visage d’Allah que nous vous nourrissons : nous ne voulons de vous ni récompense ni gratitude.
data.arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا

meta.transliteration: innamā nuṭ'ʿimukum liwajhi al-lahi lā nurīdu minkum jazāan walā shukūran

dua.name: Dua for Generosity and Compassion
dua.significanceReason: Encourages selfless giving, compassion, and supporting those in need without expecting worldly returns.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
